org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: DataEntrantStatistics
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.description: Users who enters data on NMRS - Count of number of forms filled by each users for each form as a data entry clerk
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery: select distinct u.person_id "Creator ID", concat(pn.given_name, " ", pn.family_name) as User, count(distinct cif.encounter_id) "Client Intake Form", count(distinct hiv.encounter_id) "HIV Enrollment", count(distinct acf.encounter_id) "ART Commencement Form", count(distinct aice.encounter_id) "Adult Initial Clinical Evaluation", count(distinct lof.encounter_id) "Lab Order and Result Form", count(distinct cc.encounter_id) "Care Card", count(distinct cbr.encounter_id) "Child Birth Registration", count(distinct crf.encounter_id) "Client Referral Form", count(distinct pice.encounter_id) "Pediatric Initial Clinical Evaluation", count(distinct pof.encounter_id) "Pharmacy Order Form" from users u left join person p on u.person_id=p.person_id left join person_name pn on p.person_id=pn.person_id left join encounter cif on u.person_id=cif.creator and cif.form_id = 10 and DATE_FORMAT(cif.date_created, "%Y-%m-%d") between :startDate and :endDate left join encounter hiv on u.person_id=hiv.creator and hiv.form_id = 23 and DATE_FORMAT(hiv.date_created, "%Y-%m-%d") between :startDate and :endDate left join encounter acf on u.person_id=acf.creator and acf.form_id = 56 and DATE_FORMAT(acf.date_created, "%Y-%m-%d") between :startDate and :endDate left join encounter aice on u.person_id=aice.creator and aice.form_id = 22 and DATE_FORMAT(aice.date_created, "%Y-%m-%d") between :startDate and :endDate left join encounter lof on u.person_id=lof.creator and lof.form_id = 21 and DATE_FORMAT(lof.date_created, "%Y-%m-%d") between :startDate and :endDate left join encounter cc on u.person_id=cc.creator and cc.form_id = 14 and DATE_FORMAT(cc.date_created, "%Y-%m-%d") between :startDate and :endDate left join encounter cbr on u.person_id=cbr.creator and cbr.form_id = 19 and DATE_FORMAT(cbr.date_created, "%Y-%m-%d") between :startDate and :endDate left join encounter crf on u.person_id=crf.creator and crf.form_id = 52 and DATE_FORMAT(crf.date_created, "%Y-%m-%d") between :startDate and :endDate left join encounter pice on u.person_id=pice.creator and pice.form_id = 20 and DATE_FORMAT(pice.date_created, "%Y-%m-%d") between :startDate and :endDate left join encounter pof on u.person_id=pof.creator and pof.form_id = 27 and DATE_FORMAT(pof.date_created, "%Y-%m-%d") between :startDate and :endDate group by 1, 2
